items.sentence: How do you know that Tom isn\'t a native speaker?
Tom had a difficult relationship with his father.
Tom has already been told to stay away from Mary.
Tom would\'ve liked to go to Boston last weekend.
Tom\'s bicycle was blue before he painted it red.
Tom keeps his savings in a shoebox under the bed.
Tom knew better than to say such a thing to Mary.
Tom knew who Mary was going to go to Boston with.
Tom knew you would try to convince him not to go.
Did your father hug you much when you were a kid?
